Cards are nice for the grades but the slabs do have some scratches on some.

 


A Fine Slide SGC 30 $100

A Fowl Bawl SGC 20 $100

A Tie Game SGC 40 $125

Caught Napping AGC 30 $100

Right Over The Plate SGC 50 $200

Stealing A Base SGC Auth Slight trim o/w VG/Ex $75

The Naps SGC 40 $125

 

I am only missing a few cards for my set so if you have these to trade I would trade well to complete my set

 

A Great Game

A Short Stop

Stealing Home

 

Scans are available.  Thanks



James Gallo
